title: A Font used on a UK TV show, S is like a backward Z
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/take2_4831.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013_4707.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/S_5660.png)

Font: 

 Usuzi 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172223/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Muskey

comments.content: It must be **[Usuzi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172223/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Usuzi%20-%20Regular&fid=b83770b23b9a373f5cdb041c4d9c7604&fsize=60&text=reggie%20yates%20TOP%20OF%20THE%20POPS%20fearne%20cotton&wrap=2)** by Daniel Zadorozny (Iconian Fonts, 2002, Free for personal use)

Wow, excellent, many thanks, I had tried 'What the Font' site with no luck.

Many thanks and a Happy New Year to you.
